project.name: J-C835A-JENA-08-ST02-DT01-DF06-CF14-01
project.description: This test takes a string, and reads through the string, printing out each character with ASCII value greater than 48. If it encounters a character with ASCII value less than 48, it will fail to increment the loop counter, and loop forever.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND GOOD-05 GOOD-06 AND GOOD-07 AND GOOD-08 AND GOOD-09 AND GOOD-10 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-06-01 AND GOOD-06-02 AND GOOD-06-03 AND GOOD-06-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-07 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-08 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-09-01 AND GOOD-09-02 AND GOOD-09-03 AND GOOD-09-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
GOOD-10 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.script: SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^(-|\.)$" "logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_fkV1Zie0ALvZYvz3rF14 AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_0VgAycyYv3 OR (NOT finished_DsY5JoB3jW AND NOT (controlled_exit_C0j7h7VJQa OR continued_execution_KOpKZWqCVd)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_0VgAycyYv3 OR (NOT finished_DsY5JoB3jW AND NOT (controlled_exit_C0j7h7VJQa OR continued_execution_KOpKZWqCVd))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_0VgAycyYv3 OR (NOT finished_DsY5JoB3jW AND NOT (controlled_exit_C0j7h7VJQa OR continued_execution_KOpKZWqCVd)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_0VgAycyYv3 OR (NOT finished_DsY5JoB3jW AND NOT (controlled_exit_C0j7h7VJQa OR continued_execution_KOpKZWqCVd)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_wvV8CpQbIO OR (NOT finished_0aBl3TwFyO AND NOT (controlled_exit_pMLtNieZbt OR continued_execution_xE3TOLlwt0)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_wvV8CpQbIO OR (NOT finished_0aBl3TwFyO AND NOT (controlled_exit_pMLtNieZbt OR continued_execution_xE3TOLlwt0)))))
